about:
Hello, my name is **Aman Agarwal**. An individual eager to learn and explore new fields of life and technology!

I am final year undergraduate student in **Electronics and Communication Engineering** at **Malaviya National Institute of Technology, Jaipur, Rajasthan**. I am deeply interested in Web Development and Competitive Programming with strong fundamentals of C++. I'm a technology and software enthusiast always ready to enhance my skills and work with at most dedication.
